name: GoVenture TYPING
description:
Don't you wish you could type faster and with better accuracy?
Typing is an essential skill for personal and career success ... and gaming too!
Learning proper technique is not easy but GoVenture TYPING makes it fun!
Learn how to type or type faster with the GoVenture TYPING fantasy-science-fiction game.
With 48 levels and 500 drills, you will master typing to win at school, work, and gaming!
Suitable for all ages.
